learning_outcomes: Describe physical properties of metals
Identify the composition of common alloys
State the uses of metals and alloys in day-to-day life
Explain causes, effects and prevention of rusting
Appreciate the importance of proper use and maintenance of metallic materials
skills_to_assess: Ability to explain the effect of rusting on metals
Ability to outline uses of metals and alloys

learning_outcomes: Identify sources of electricity in the environment
Demonstrate flow of electric current using simple electric circuits
Identify common electrical appliances used in day-to-day life
Identify safety measures observed when handling electrical appliances
Appreciate the use of electricity in day-to-day life
skills_to_assess: Ability to identify common electrical appliances used in day-to-day life
Ability to identify safety measures observed when handling electrical appliances
Ability to identify sources of electricity in the environment

learning_outcomes: Describe the structure and functions of parts of plant and animal cells
Differentiate between plant and animal cells
Appreciate the role of cells in living organisms
skills_to_assess: Ability to identify and describe parts of plant and animal cells

learning_outcomes: Demonstrate the properties of a magnet
Classify materials as magnetic or non-magnetic
Identify the uses of magnets in day-to-day life
Appreciate the applications of magnets in day-to-day life
skills_to_assess: Ability to demonstrate the properties of a magnet
Ability to identify the uses of magnets in day-to-day life

learning_outcomes: Describe the parts and functions of the human reproductive system
Explain the process of fertilisation and development of the embryo
Practise appropriate hygiene and care during puberty
Demonstrate responsible behaviour regarding sexuality
Appreciate the importance of reproductive health and responsibility
skills_to_assess: Ability to describe parts of the reproductive system and their functions

learning_outcomes: Identify acids and bases using a litmus paper
Prepare an acid-base indicator from plant extracts
Describe the physical properties of acids and bases
Outline applications of acids, bases and indicators in real life
Appreciate the uses of acids and bases in real life
skills_to_assess: Ability to identify acids and bases
Ability to outline applications of acids and bases in real life
